About.description: In 2021, I completed a full-stack web development diploma at UTN. Since then, I have continued expanding my knowledge through self-learning, working on personal projects, and collaborating in teams, mainly as a frontend developer.As a full-stack developer, I have primarily worked with the MERN stack. Additionally, I have experience with version control using Git and proficiency in various tools such as Figma, Visual Studio Code, NPM, Yarn, Trello, and Postman. I have also collaborated with other developers following the SCRUM methodology.
